name: Rocketcat
description: Rocketcat is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its unique combination of traits, Rocketcat stands out among its robotic peers. Its body resembles a soldier's box, while its arms and legs are equipped with powerful rocket boosters, allowing it to navigate through various terrains with ease. Rocketcat's screen displays a charming cat, adding a touch of personality to its mechanical appearance. To enhance its visual capabilities and precision, Rocketcat wears a pair of stylish glasses. With its impressive abilities and skills, Rocketcat is a formidable companion in the world of WebtrES.
